snippet.title: Creatures of Ava | Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We now know the release date of #CreaturesOfAva. Watch the latest trailer to find out! 👀

Wishlist #CreaturesOfAva: http://steam.gs/l/z4j26/05062024

In Creatures of Ava, your goal is to tame, befriend, and save—not capture—the many unique species you will encounter. Featuring a non-violent combat system and four distinct, vividly radiant biomes to explore, Ava is a planet in peril slowly decaying under the pressure of a mystical infection called ‘The Withering’. Take on the role of bright-eyed adventurer, Vic, and investigate Ava’s vibrant landscapes while taking action to save its existence and the existence of all its inhabitants. 

But what does it mean to truly save something? While our human inclination is to protect the weak and aid the vulnerable, will you dare to let go in the face of adversity when the struggle becomes too much? It’s up to you to understand and stop the epidemic inflicting Ava and know when to swallow the bitter taste of walking away.
